name: branch-script-diff-check
description: GitHub Actions for Comparing Shell Script Results Across Two Branches

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test
scripts._dev:upload: npm run build && npm run package && git add . && git commit -m 'chore' && git push
scripts._dev:tag:patch: npm version patch && git push --tags && npm run _dev:tag:update-v1
scripts._dev:tag:minor: npm version minor && git push --tags && npm run _dev:tag:update-v1
scripts._dev:tag:major: npm version major && git push --tags && npm run _dev:tag:update-v1
scripts._dev:tag:update-v1: git tag -d v1 && git push origin :refs/tags/v1 && git tag v1 && git push --tags

author: lainNao
